title: Sidewall, 1820
creditline: Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum
description: Staggered horizontal rows of pointed arches with scalloped inner edges which enframe single flower with conventionalized leaves and stem. Silver and gold and green on brown ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1820.
1820. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Brighton Art Gallery and Museum. 1950-59-11.
